fact.description: The match has started.
Djamel Haimoudi awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Netherlands in the half of Brazil.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Netherlands.
Thiago Silva (Brazil) has received a first yellow card.
Robin van Persie nets and Netherlands now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Netherlands's half?
Djamel Haimoudi signals a Brazil throw-in in Netherlands's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brasilia.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arjen Robben (Netherlands) gets a yellow card.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Brazil.
Throw-in Netherlands.
Goal kick for Brazil at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Netherlands needs to be cautious. Brazil have an attacking throw-in.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Free kick for Netherlands in their own half.
Goal! Netherlands extend their lead to 0-2 through Daley Blind.
Free kick Brazil.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oscar gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brazil.
Brazil push forward at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia and Maicon gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Netherlands defence.
Free kick for Netherlands in the half of Brazil.
Djamel Haimoudi awards Brazil a goal kick.
In Brasilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a Brazil throw-in in Netherlands's half.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Djamel Haimoudi awards the home team a throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Brazil close to the penalty box.
Brazil surge into the attack at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia but David Luizâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Brazil awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Netherlands's Jonathan de Guzman breaks free at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia . But the strike goes wide of the post.
Brazil have a goal kick.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Netherlands.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Brazil just outside Netherlands's area.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Can Brazil capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Brazil's Ramires gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Djamel Haimoudi awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Jonathan de Guzman is booked for the away team.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Netherlands territory.
Netherlands will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Brazil.
David Luiz (Brazil) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Netherlands at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dirk Kuyt.
Djamel Haimoudi has blown to resume play in Brasilia.
Free kick for Netherlands in their own half.
Dirk Kuyt has recovered and rejoins the match in Brasilia.
Netherlands push forward through Robin van Persie, whose finish on goal is saved.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Brazil are in shooting range from this free kick.
Play has been resumed at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Play has been interrupted briefly in Brasilia to check on Ramires, who is grimacing with pain.
Oscar (Brazil) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Brazil's Maxwell misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brasilia.
Ramires for Brazil is back on the field again.
Djamel Haimoudi will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the first half.
Throw-in for Brazil in the half of Netherlands.
The first-half is over at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Luiz Felipe Scolari (Brazil) is making a first substitution, with Fernandinho replacing Luiz Gustavo.
Paulinho of Brazil is pulled up for offside.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Throw-in for Brazil at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Djamel Haimoudi.
Free kick for Netherlands in the half of Brazil.
Goal kick for Brazil at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
In Brasilia, Arjen Robben of Netherlands is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Netherlands.
Fernandinho (Brazil) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Luiz Felipe Scolari is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia with Hernanes replacing Paulinho.
Free kick for Netherlands in their own half.
In Brasilia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Georginio Wijnaldum for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ramires of Brazil gets in a strike, but is off target.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brazil close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brasilia.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Brasilia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Brazil drive forward and David Luiz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a throw-in for Brazil, close to Netherlands's area.
Throw-in for Brazil in the half of Netherlands.
Throw-in Netherlands.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Brazil.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Djamel Haimoudi waits before resuming play because Daley Blind for Netherlands is still down.
Oscar is booked for the home team.
The match at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia is underway again.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Daley Blind, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Daryl Janmaat is the substitute for Netherlands.
Throw-in Brazil.
Netherlands's Robin van Persie is whistled for offside at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
The home team have replaced Ramires with Hulk. This is the third substitution made today by Luiz Felipe Scolari.
Djamel Haimoudi awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Djamel Haimoudi.
Djamel Haimoudi awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Brazil in the half of Netherlands.
Brazil are coming forward and Hulk gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Djamel Haimoudi awards Netherlands a goal kick.
Can Netherlands get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Djamel Haimoudi signals a Netherlands throw-in in Brazil's half.
Free kick Netherlands.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Brazil are pushing forward but Oscar's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Netherlands goal kick.
Goal kick for Brazil at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Netherlands in their own half.
Throw-in for Netherlands at Estadio Nacional de Brasilia .
Free kick in a good position for Brazil!
Netherlands awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Netherlands.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brasilia.
Netherlands attack but Dirk Kuyt's header doesn't find the target.
Djamel Haimoudi signals a free kick to Netherlands in their own half.
Attention is being given to Netherlandsâ€™s Jordy Clasie and play has been suspended briefly.
The match in Brasilia is underway once more.
Louis van Gaal (Netherlands) is making a second change, with Joel Veltman replacing the possibly injured Jordy Clasie.
5 minutes will be added to the second half.
Daryl Janmaat instrumental with a fine assist.
Netherlands have a goal kick.
The away team replace Jasper Cillessen with Michel Vorm.
Free kick for Brazil in their own half.
Maicon for Brazil gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brasilia.
Djamel Haimoudi blows to end the match. The final score is 0-3.
